title: State v. Chester Hollman III – Addendum 3 – Crime Reporting
content:encoded:
February 22, 2018 / Addendum host Jon Cryer, along with Colin Miller and guest panelists Michaelle Bond (@MichaelleBond) and Emilie Lounsberry (@emilielounsberr) discuss the Hollman case and crime reporting in Philadelphia.

Today’s addendum has been sponsored by Hims, Audible, and Mafia.

www.ForHims.com/Undisclosed
